mapper.insert: INSERT INTO t_feed ( location, ctnt, iuser) VALUES ( #{location}, #{ctnt}, #{iuser})
mapper.select: SELECT A.ifeed, A.location, A.ctnt, A.iuser, A.regdt , B.ifeedimg, B.img , C.nm AS writer, C.mainProfile FROM t_feed A LEFT JOIN t_feed_img B ON A.ifeed = B.ifeed INNER JOIN t_user C ON A.iuser = C.iuser ORDER BY A.ifeed DESC

SELECT A.ifeed, A.location, A.ctnt, A.iuser, A.regdt , C.nm AS writer, C.mainProfile , IFNULL(E.cnt, 0) AS favCnt
, CASE WHEN D.ifeed IS NULL THEN 0 ELSE 1 END AS isFav
FROM t_feed A INNER JOIN t_user C ON A.iuser = C.iuser
AND C.iuser = ${iuserForMyFeed}
LEFT JOIN ( SELECT ifeed, COUNT(ifeed) AS cnt FROM t_feed_fav GROUP BY ifeed ) E ON A.ifeed = E.ifeed
LEFT JOIN t_feed_fav D ON D.iuser = ${iuserForFav} AND A.ifeed = D.ifeed
ORDER BY A.ifeed DESC LIMIT #{startIdx}, #{limit}

SELECT A.*, COUNT(A.icmt) - 1 AS isMore FROM ( SELECT A.icmt, A.cmt, A.regdt, A.ifeed , B.iuser, B.nm as writer, B.mainProfile as writerProfile FROM t_feed_cmt A INNER JOIN t_user B ON A.iuser = B.iuser WHERE A.ifeed = ${ifeed} ORDER BY icmt ASC LIMIT 2 ) A GROUP BY A.ifeed

SELECT A.icmt, A.cmt, A.regdt, B.iuser, B.nm as writer, B.mainProfile as writerProfile FROM t_feed_cmt A INNER JOIN t_user B ON A.iuser = B.iuser WHERE A.ifeed = #{ifeed} ORDER BY icmt ASC LIMIT 1, 20000
mapper.insert: INSERT INTO t_feed_cmt (ifeed, iuser, cmt) VALUES (#{ifeed}, #{iuser}, #{cmt})
